name: 35th Annual Conch Republic Independence Celebration
short_description: With activities ranging from wacky bed race to a lighthearted sea battle featuring tall ships, the Conch Republic’s
long_description: With activities ranging from wacky bed race to a lighthearted sea battle featuring tall ships, the Conch Republic’s 10-day birthday party showcases the independent and eccentric spirit that characterizes the Florida Keys.
